date.headline: CRO-102
date.text: This is a user story to validate the POC API

date.headline: CRO-118
date.text: This is a user story to pull the data from JIRA Server

date.headline: CRO-119

date.headline: Grid vs List
date.text: Does the view type have an impact on click thrus and conversions?

date.headline: Bellyband Orange vs Plain
date.text: Different icons in the belly band may increase engagement and conversions

date.headline: Bellyband Devices
date.text: Placing a thumbnail of some of our most popular devices and accessory within the homepage belly band increase engagement and conversions

date.headline: Manufacturing Filter
date.text: Moving the Filter by Manufacturer to the top of the filters list will increase conversion

date.headline: Price Block
date.text: Showing a price comparison tool for term selection will increase the device details page conversion rate.

date.headline: Product Description
date.text: Adding a brief product description above the image but below the product title on the device details pages will increase conversion and SEO ranking

date.headline: Quicklinks
date.text: Adding Quicklinks to the homepage will increase engagement and conversion

date.headline: KB Articles
date.text: Changing the positions of the Feedback and Related Solutions sections in the KB articles will not decrease clicks to the related solutions links.

date.headline: 4G LTE Icons
date.text: Removing the 4G/4G LTE icons from the device list page tiles will not have a negative impact on conversion.

date.headline: Mobileshare 10GB Plan
date.text: Moving the 10 GB plan option up on the plans selection page will increase the take rate for the 10 GB plan while not having a negative impact on conversion.

date.headline: Remove No Thanks
date.text: Removing 'No Thanks' from the accessory detail pages price block will not have a negative impact on accessory sales.

date.headline: MPP MI Order
date.text: Presenting MI first on the services list page will increase net sales of MI to offset $3 MRC from MPP.

date.headline: Remove continue button on accessory list
date.text: Hiding the Continue to Next Step button when the cart is empty will not have a negative impact on conversion.

date.headline: Secondary tray open
date.text: Changing the default state of the global navigation show the secondary tray open will improve conversion.

date.headline: Quicklinks Update
date.text: Adding Quicklinks to the homepage will increase engagement and conversion.

date.headline: BYOP SIM straight to cart
date.text: Bypassing the details page and adding the identified SIM straight to the customer’s cart will increase conversion.

date.headline: Accessory Carousel
date.text: Multivariate test to understand the impact of accessories detail page presentations; 3 variants will be tested.

date.headline: Special Offers Deals
date.text: Changing the copy for Special Offers in the global navigation to “Deals” will increase conversion.

date.headline: Shopmobile
date.text: Changing the order of the shopwireless menu and adding “Purchase” to the phones category and “Research” to the plans category will increase conversion.

date.headline: Wireless Cart
date.text: Adding a My Wireless Cart icon to Shop Wireless Landers will increase conversion.

date.headline: Global Nav Wearables
date.text: Adding catgories for wearables and health and fitness under the accessories and more menu in global nav will increase conversion and engagement.

date.headline: Mobile Plans
date.text: Adding copy to clarify for users that they must first select a device before they can purchase a plan will increase conversion.

date.headline: Browser Looping Modal
date.text: Providing a notification to guide users toward performant browsers will increase conversion.

date.headline: Tablets-Gadgets Link Mask
date.text: Adding a link mask to the images on tablets-gadgets.html will increase conversions. Moving the link above the image will increase conversions.

date.headline: Hide Banner Wireless Plans
date.text: Hiding the MobileShare banner and related copy on the wireless plans page.

date.headline: Cart Summary
date.text: Modifying the layout of the cart summary page will reduce cart abandonment and increase conversion.

date.tag: details, price block, smartphones, device details
date.headline: PriceBlock update
date.text: Showing a price comparison tool for term selection will increase the device details page conversion rate.

date.headline: Pick up today
date.text: Changing copy on the details page from “ check in-store availability” to “pick-up today” will improve online conversion.

date.headline: Appcessories
date.text: Changing copy in the accessory flow from “Appcessories” to “Smart Accessories” will improve conversion.

date.headline: Zoom
date.text: Utilizing zoom functionality on the accessory detail pages will improve conversion.

date.headline: Upgrade thank you page modal
date.text: Adding a message to notify upgrade customers that they can add a line to their MobileShare plan and utilize their old (upgraded) device will increase AAL.

date.tag: price block, filter, next, device details
date.headline: Next 18 Filter
date.text: Defaulting the contract selection filter to Next 18 will increase conversion.

date.headline: Suppress Infinite Scroll
date.text: Suppressing infinite scroll on the accessories list page will improve conversion.

date.headline: Session Expiration Alert
date.text: Alerting the customer to session expiration within the browser tab will increase conversion.

date.headline: Google Play
date.text: Adding a google play offer on top on priceblock for offer valid phones will increase conversion.

date.headline: ATT Calculator
date.text: Providing a calculator to compare contract types will increase conversion.

date.headline: Cart Summary FPT Widget
date.text: Adding the FPT widget to the cart summary page will increase conversion.

date.headline: Next Calculator
date.text: Providing a calculator to compare contract types will increase conversion.

date.headline: MobileShare 10 GB plan (Mobile)
date.text: Moving the 10 GB plan option up on the plans selection page will increase the take rate for the 10 GB plan while not having a negative impact on conversion.

date.headline: Homepage Wireless Link
date.text: On att.com homepage changing the link for the wireless tile from the shop lander to the smartphones list page will increase add to cart and conversions.

date.headline: Services List
date.text: Consolidating and reorganizing the services list page will increase conversion.

date.headline: Compare Calculator
date.text: Providing a calculator to compare contract types will increase conversion.

date.headline: Remove Optional Selections
date.text: Removing optional selections will increase the attach rate of MI/MPP.

date.headline: Device List Design
date.text: Increasing tile size and eliminating filters on the list page will increase conversion.

date.headline: Shipping Info
date.text: Clearly communicating shipping information to customers will reduce call volumes for shipping delays and increase customer satisfaction.

date.headline: Accessories list strike-through
date.text: Displaying the regular (strike-through) price and the sale price of accessories on all accessory list pages will improve conversion.

date.headline: WHP Remove Right Rail
date.text: Removing the right rail on the Wireless Home Phone page will reduce distraction and increase WHP conversion.

date.headline: Mobile shop u-verse CTA
date.text: Changing the copy on the mobile shop u-verse page CTA will reduce abandonment, reduce click-thru rate for the contact us link, and increase the click-through rate for the main CTA.

date.headline: Auto-Save Cart
date.text: Automatically saving the customers cart before session expiration will increase conversion.

date.headline: Accessory detail MVT
date.text: Changing the design of the accessory detail page will increase conversion.

date.headline: Special Offers Updated
date.text: Changing the copy for Special Offers in the global navigation to 'Special Deals' or 'Online Deals' will increase conversion.

date.headline: (Update) Price Block
date.text: Presenting different contract term layouts in the price block will increase the Next attach rate.

date.tag: shop, lander page, wireless, list page
date.headline: Shop tile link
date.text: Changing the link for the Shop/Wireless tile from the Shop Lander to the Cellphones list page will increase conversion.

date.headline: (Update) Remove Optional Selections
date.text: Removing optional selections will increase the attach rate of MI/MPP.

date.tag: video, smartphones, device details, details page
date.headline: Invodo Interactive
date.text: Adding a device specific interactive video to the device details page will increase conversion.

date.headline: (Update) Device List Design
date.text: Increasing tile size and eliminating filters on the list page will increase conversion.

date.tag: video, details page, device details, price block
date.headline: Amazon Fire Interactive Video
date.text: Adding an interactive video experience to the device details page will increase conversion.

date.headline: WHP Description
date.text: Adding a product description under the product name on the Wireless Home Phone page will increase understanding of the product and increase WHP conversion.

date.headline: MyAtt Services Profile Upgrade Link
date.text: Presenting the Check Upgrade Options link on the profile page will increase engagement with the link and increase satisfaction.

date.headline: GN Link Changes
date.text: Changing the navigation on Shop and Shop Wireless Landers will improve conversion.

date.headline: Accessory GN Link Changes
date.text: Linking directly to the list page in the global nav rather than the lander will increase conversion.

date.headline: Shop Now Buttons
date.text: Including button style CTAs is more effective that clickable images and links alone.

date.headline: Mobile Wireless plans CTA
date.text: Duplicating the CTA higher up on the page will increase conversion.

date.headline: GoPhone CTA
date.text: Adding a CTA above the fold on the page will increase conversion.

date.headline: Movers Offers
date.text: Changing the location of the CTA on the Movers Offers Landing Page will increase click-through rate on the Get Started CTA.

date.headline: T-Data Marquee (unauthenticated)
date.text: T-Data on the unauthenticated shop lander page marquee yields higher conversion rates when compared to CQ fed content.

date.headline: Free Shipping/Free Returns
date.text: Adding a free shipping banner to the top of the page will increase conversion.

date.headline: Mobile shop u-verse CTA Phase 2
date.text: Changing the copy on the mobile shop u-verse page CTA will reduce abandonment, reduce click-thru rate for the contact us link, and increase the click-through rate for the main CTA.

date.headline: U-verse IPDSL
date.text: Updating various Marquee elements in the IPDSL Landing Page will increase CTR, order initiations, and conversion rate.

date.headline: Wireless Customer
date.text: Updating the Marquee CTA copy will increase CTR, order initiations, and conversion rate.

date.headline: UPDATE myAtt Services Profile Upgrade Link
date.text: Presenting the Check Upgrade Options link on the profile page will increase engagement with the link and increase satisfaction.

date.headline: Homepage Login
date.text: Collapsing the Homepage Login form will not decrease customer logins.

date.headline: IRU Tiles
date.text: Presenting IRU content on the Homepage and Shop Wireless Lander will drive traffic to the new IRU Lander.

date.headline: 10GB Badge
date.text: Adding content to differentiate the 10GB plan will increase conversion and sales of the 10GB plan.

date.headline: U-verse Check Availability
date.text: Displaying only required fields on the Check Availability page will improve customer experience, reduce user-entered errors, and increase conversion rate.

date.headline: (UPDATE) Mobile Wireless plans CTA
date.text: Duplicating the CTA higher up on the page will increase conversion.

date.headline: T-Data
date.text: T-Data content on the Shop Lander Marquee will increase conversion when compared to CQ content.

date.headline: U-verse HSIA
date.text: Changing the order of the selections on the U-verse HSIA page from ascending to descending will increase take rate for the higher plans and revenue per customer without negatively impacting conversion.

date.headline: BlueKai Bellyband
date.text: Utilizing BlueKai data to personalize the presentation of the homepage bellyband will increase CTR for personalized content and conversion.

date.headline: Free Phones Banner
date.text: Adding free phones content to the shop wireless lander will increase conversion.

date.headline: Stacked Recommendation Carousel
date.text: Using a stacked recommendation carousel at the accessory step in the buy flow will increase accessory attach rate.

date.headline: Cart Summary AB
date.text: Modifying the layout of the cart summary page to implement the three most performant variants from the previous cart summary multivariate test will increase order conversion.

date.headline: Homepage Redesign - Desktop
date.text: Modifying the layout of att.com will help users navigate into the sales, service, and support flows faster and improve CSAT and conversion.

date.headline: Homepage Redesign - Mobile
date.text: Modifying the layout of att.com will help users navigate into the sales, service, and support flows faster and improve CSAT and conversion.

date.tag: whats this, modal, price block, device details, details page, smartphones, next
date.headline: Dynamic 'What’s This' Modal
date.text: Having a What's this modal respective to the device improves CSAT and conversion.

date.headline: Persado
date.text: Optimizing content on the Next Lander using Persado will increase conversion.

date.headline: GoPhone Marquee Content
date.text: Using processor specific content on the marquee will increase CTA click through and device conversion.

date.headline: Double Data call out
date.text: Using content that highlights the double data promotion will help users recognize the offer and increase conversion for the eligible plans.

date.headline: Upgrade Advantage
date.text: By placing the Check Eligibility button and including Next content in the marquee we will increase upgrade logins over current login rate, and increase Next attach.

date.headline: Whats ATT Next on upgrade eligibility page
date.text: Presenting the 'What’s this' modal link on the upgrade eligibility page will increase Next attach for upgrade customers.

date.headline: T-Data Marquee Authenticated
date.text: Monitoring marquee content

date.headline: U-verse Promo Bar
date.text: Altering creative styling on the promo bar in u-verse will increase click through and conversion.

date.headline: CLN without 2_year pricing
date.text: Removing 2 year pricing for CLN devices will increase Next Attach.

date.headline: Cases List Default Sort Order
date.text: Customers that visit the Cases list page with 'Best Selling' default sort will have higher product views and higher conversion than those that view the list page 'Featured' Default sort.

date.headline: Double Data Copy
date.text: Using content that helps users to understand how they can use 30GB of data will increase take rate of the 30GB plan.

date.tag: device details, price block, adwords, details page, smartphones
date.headline: AdWords Copy
date.text: Using consistent copy on the device details page when traffic comes from AdWords will increase add to cart clicks and conversion.

date.headline: Accessory List Page Promo
date.text: Accessory List Page Promo

date.headline: (UPDATE) Dynamic Whats This Modal
date.text: Presenting dynamic content for specific devices on the device details page 'what’s this' modal will improve the user’s understanding of Next and increase Next attach rate and conversion.

date.headline: U-verse $39 Offer
date.text: Displaying the $39 DP offer on the Most Popular Bundles page will increase orders and conversion rate without negatively impacting sales revenue.

date.headline: Hide Next 12 18
date.text: Limiting the number of Next options will simplify the price block and increase Next attach.

date.headline: U-verse Marquee CTA
date.text: Updating the marquee CTA copy will increase CTR, order initiations, and conversion rate.

date.headline: (UPDATE) Homepage Redesign
date.text: Modifying the layout of att.com will help users navigate into the sales, service, and support flows faster and improve CSAT and conversion.

date.headline: Suppress Accessory Continue Button
date.text: Accessory attach rate will increase in the device buy flow if the 'Continue to Next Step' button only appears at the bottom of the accessory list page in the accessories step of the buy flow.

date.headline: Bundled promotions in cart
date.text: When offers are presented on the cart summary page to qualified users offer performance will increase.

date.tag: mobile share, plans page, wireless, data plan
date.headline: 10GB copy
date.text: Using content that helps users to understand how they can use 10GB of data will increase take rate of the 10GB plan.

date.headline: (UPDATE) BlueKai Bellyband
date.text: Utilizing BlueKai data to personalize the presentation of the homepage bellyband will increase CTR for personalized content and conversion.

date.headline: Device Detail Accessory cross sell
date.text: Making accessories accessible on (phone/tablet) device detail pages will increase conversion.

date.tag: price block, device details, details page, smartphones
date.headline: Term Selection Copy
date.text: Using copy that focuses on upgrade time frame and down payment rather than using standard term selection names on the device details page price-block will increase Next attach rate.

date.headline: (UPDATE) Cart Summary Promo - Bundles
date.text: Using copy that focuses on upgrade time frame and down payment rather than using standard term selection names on the device details page price-block will increase Next attach rate.

date.headline: Beats promotions
date.text: Making users aware of Beats promotions that they qualify for at the end of the buy-flow before the cart summary page will increase the performance of the promotion.

date.headline: U-verse Special Offers
date.text: Higher visibility of Special Offers modals for both U-verse products will increase conversion rate and Upsells orders by displaying them above the fold.

date.headline: Multi-line modal
date.text: Adding a message within the 'Important info about your cart' modal to inform users that they can only upgrade 1 line at a time will improve CSAT.

date.tag: modal, price block, device details, details page, smartphones
date.headline: Two-year Contract Modal Popup
date.text: Alerting new users to missing MSV savings via a modal will encourage them to select Next and increase Next attach.

date.headline: U-verse Ratings and Reviews
date.text: Suppressing the 'Rates and Reviews' on the Shop LOB pages will not affect order conversions.

date.headline: U-verse Mobile Navigation
date.text: Suppressing the navigation menu bar within the Mobile Buy Flow (after Check Availability) will not decrease conversion.

date.headline: U-verse Home Phone Marquee
date.text: Using content that is designed for a particular segment (retiree) will increase CTR, order initiations, and conversion rate.

date.headline: Global Nav Cart Icon
date.text: By placing the My Wireless Cart link to the right of the search bar, it will increase cart conversions.

date.tag: mobile, term select, price block, plans
date.headline: Mobile Term Selection CTA
date.text: Adding 'Cancel/Select' CTA above the contract options on the mobile term selection page will increase Next attach.

date.headline: Cart Summary cross sell modal for accessories
date.text: Customers that click the 'Add accessories' link on the Cart Summary page and see the Cross-Sell modal add more accessories to cart and convert higher than the list page variant.

date.headline: Alternate copy tested for auto-pay registration page
date.text: Using different copy on auto-pay registration pages will increase enrollment in auto-pay.

date.headline: Accessory Promo Tile on left rail of list page
date.text: Displaying a promotional tile in the left rail of the accessory list page will increase offer performance and increase accessory attach.

date.headline: Test CTA copy for U-verse Promo Bar Phase 2
date.text: Changing the button within the alert bar on uverse.com from 'Get Started' to 'Check Availability' and using the check availability modal instead of the page will increase orders.

date.headline: International Travel product alternate copy (Desktop)
date.text: Using different copy for International travel plan option labels will increase Plan link CTR and conversion.

date.tag: msv, mobileshare, plans page, plans list
date.headline: Curated MSV plans list
date.text: Listing the higher selling plans at the top of the list will increase the take rate for those plans.

date.headline: Add a Next focused banner to the Free Phones List
date.text: Adding a Next banner to the Free Phones filter on the device list page will increase Next attach and conversion.

date.headline: Suppress accessory carousels on details pages
date.text: Suppressing the accessory recommender and frequently purchased together carousel/s on device/accessory details pages increases accessory attach or not.

date.headline: Shop wireless tablet marque position 4 comparison of 2 offers
date.text: Using the everyday value tablet marquee in position 4 rather than the device specific marquee will increase conversion.

date.headline: Accessory Bellyband (Charger in position 2)
date.text: Placing an icon for accessories on the Homepage Bellyband will increase accessory attach rate.

date.headline: Default to Triple Play
date.text: Displaying Triple Play Filter and Triple Play offers by default will result in improvement in DP and TP % (hence revenue) out of total sales without impacting conversion rate.

date.headline: U-verse tile content - compare 3 variant options for content banner at top of page
date.text: Using different content/tiles on uverse.com will increase conversion.

date.headline: Suppress the 'AT&T land line phone' option and related content
date.text: Removing the 'AT&T Landline' option in the mobile Check Availability Page will reduce user-entered errors and increase conversion rate by presenting the user with the appropriate Response Page.

date.tag: accessories, accessory, cases, cart summary, promo
date.headline: $10 cases on cart summary in bundled promo area
date.text: Offering affordable cases to customers that do not have a case in cart in the cart summary promotional area will increase accessory attach rate.

date.headline: (UPDATE) Accessory Bellyband  (Charger in position 6)
date.text: Adding accessories to the ATT.com homepage belly band will increase traffic to accessories and ultimately lead to more accessories revenue and units sold.

date.headline: (UPDATE) U-verse Check Availability
date.text: Displaying only required fields on the Check Availability page will improve customer experience, reduce user-entered errors, and increase conversion rate.

date.text: Adding the 'What’s This' modal table to the Next landing page will decrease exit rates from the page, and increase Next attach.

date.headline: Use alternate copy 'I Decline device protection' on features list page
date.text: Using more direct copy to decline insurance coverage will increase take rate for insurance products.

date.headline: T-Data on Shop Lander - Unauthenticated
date.text: T-Data on the unauthenticated shop lander page marquee yields higher panel CTR rates and orders when compared to CQ fed content for U-verse and Wireless content.

date.tag: price block, device details, details page, reviews, smartphones
date.headline: Add rates and review stars to device detail page under product description
date.text: Adding device star rating and number of reviews at the top of the details page immediately below the product name will increase conversion.

date.headline: (UPDATE) Homepage Redesign Phase 2
date.text: Modifying the layout of att.com will help users navigate into the sales, service, and support flows faster and improve CSAT and conversion.

date.headline: International Travel product alternate copy (Mobile)
date.text: Using different copy for International travel plan option labels will increase Plan link CTR and conversion.

date.headline: Bundled Promo offer within a modal after line configuration
date.text: Offering a bundled promotion to qualified users at the end of the buy flow will increase offer performance.

date.headline: $10 cases on cart summary inline treatment vs Promo treatment
date.text: Offering affordable cases to customers that do not have a case in cart in the cart summary add accessory area will increase accessory attach rate.

date.headline: Reduce the number of U-verse Marquee panels in the Rotation
date.text: Displaying fewer marquees will increase overall CTR for marquees and not have a negative impact on sales.

date.headline: Samsung Gear Circle in Cart Summary Promo
date.text: When offers are presented on the cart summary page to qualified users offer performance will increase.

date.headline: G6 Device Launch support - CTA copy changed to 'Coming Soon'
date.text: Button copy is changed from 'Out of Stock' to 'Coming Soon' for select pre-order devices.

date.headline: Bundled Promo Modal (Gear Circle)
date.text: Offering a bundled promotion to qualified users at the end of the buy flow will increase offer performance.

date.headline: Accessory Bellyband Headphone vs Charger Icon
date.text: Adding accessories to the ATT.com homepage belly band will increase traffic to accessories and ultimately lead to more accessories revenue and units sold.

date.headline: Suppress 'AT&T Landline' on availability.html page (take 2)
date.text: Removing the 'AT&T Landline' option in the mobile Check Availability Page will reduce user-entered errors and increase conversion rate by presenting the user with the appropriate Response Page.

date.headline: Suppressing the Account Management tiles on gophone.html
date.text: Suppressing the icons in the static tiles to the right of the marquee on the GoPhone lander will increase CTR for account management links.

date.headline: Add Accessories to the Global Nav
date.text: Adding accessories to the ATT.com global nav will increase traffic to accessories and ultimately lead to more accessories revenue and units sold.

date.headline: Video Icon on device details
date.text: Using an icon that is more easily recognized will result in higher CTR for the icon and higher conversions on the devices.

date.headline: Cart Summary Redesign with summaries at the top of the page
date.text: Presenting the prices on the Cart Summary page in sections that call out monthly, due today and one-time costs versus price points within the context of a line (as in production today) will minimize confusion and increase conversion.

date.headline: Shop mobile - remove Cancel Button from termselection.html
date.text: Removing the “Cancel” CTA from the “Cancel/Select” CTA on the mobile term selection page will increase conversion.

date.headline: International Travel Copy Phase 2
date.text: Using different copy for International travel plan option labels will increase Plan link CTR and conversion.

date.tag: price block, accessories, accessory, device details, details page, smartphones
date.headline: On device details fit the Accessory Carousel below the device video but left of the price block
date.text: By elevating the accessory recommendations carousel on the device details page, accessory add-to-cart clicks and sales/attach rate will increase.

date.headline: Highlight Next savings within the table on mobileshare.html page
date.text: Showing users the value of MSV savings on the MobileShare plans page and allowing them to change their term selection to Next will increase Next attach.

date.headline: LG Marquee - special-offers.html
date.text: Reducing copy to focus on standalone free offers or bill credit with Next offers rather than combining offer copy on marquees will increase CTR for the learn more CTA.

date.headline: Split term selection options on different tabs
date.text: Framing content differently to separate payment types will not decrease conversion on the mobile termselection.html page.

date.headline: Uverse bundles in descending order
date.text: Reordering the bundles displayed on the shop offers page will increase the take rate for the higher offer packages without having a negative impact on conversion rate.

date.headline: Uverse bundles in descending order
date.text: Reordering the bundles displayed on the shop offers page will increase the take rate for the higher offer packages without having a negative impact on conversion rate.

date.headline: Suppress BYOB CTA on offers.html page
date.text: Removing the Build Your Own Bundle CTA from the Shop Offers Page will improve conversion without negatively impacting quality of sales.

date.tag: price block, list page, smartphones, next
date.headline: On List and Device details page set the default pricing from Next to 2-year
date.text: Changing the default contract type from ATT Next to 2year for new customers (unauthenticated) will increase conversions.

date.headline: Shop Bundles - Different CTA Copy of marquess
date.text: Updating the marquee CTA copy will increase CTR, order initiations, and conversion rate.

date.headline: Mobile Insurance 'I Decline Device Protection'
date.text: Using more direct copy to decline insurance coverage will increase take rate for insurance products.

date.headline: Changing list pages to check out CTA button colors - (Gold, Orange, Green)
date.text: Providing a consistent color for the primary CTA on the page will increase conversion, engagement and reduce page abandonment.

date.headline: Suppress Session Expire modal
date.text: Removing session expire functionality will increase conversion.

date.headline: Overnight shipping copy on device details
date.text: Adding more precise delivery expectations will increase conversions/sales.

date.headline: Comparison of interstitial treatment vs cart summary promo
date.text: The cart summary promotional area will perform better to increase offer take rate when compared to the interstitial/modal.

date.headline: Suppress green MSV savings statements on price block
date.text: Savings statements are confusing to customers, removal of the statements will increase Next attach.

date.headline: Add eSupport video descriptions and stack videos
date.text: Placing relevant text on-page near a support video will increase CTR for the videos and decrease the direct call rate for that video.

date.tag: features list, modal, service list, accessories, accessory
date.headline: Features list cross sell modal when users decline device protection
date.text: Offering a case carousel on the services list page when a customer declines insurance will increase accessory attach.

date.tag: accessories, accessory, list page, wireless, mobile
date.headline: Accessories in Navigation List under wireless on mobile
date.text: Adding accessories to the m.att.com global nav under the wireless option will increase traffic to accessories and ultimately lead to more accessories revenue and units sold.

date.headline: Uverse default double play instead of triple play
date.text: Displaying Double Play offers by default will result in improvement in DP and TV sales (hence revenue) out of total sales without impacting conversion rate.

date.headline: Homepage marquee T-data versus CQ
date.text: This is a monitoring campaign to capture data for revenues/sales associated with the T-data AB test. The T-data AB test is not conrolled by Maxymiser/Conversion Incubator, but rather is enabled by jsp code deployed to the page.

date.tag: feature list, service list, insurance, desktop
date.headline: Add device retail cost to features list page
date.text: Making the full replacement cost for a device apparent on the features list page will increase insurance product take rate.

date.headline: Change 'All Cell Phones' link on Global Navigation
date.text: Updating “All Cell Phones & Devices” global navigation link from the devices lander page to cellphones list page and updating the link copy on global navigation will increase conversion.

date.headline: Suppress uverse promo banner
date.text: Displaying a Promo banner increases CTR, orders and higher TV Services and bolt-ons.

date.headline: Across myAT&T Sales Touch Commerce chat will be suppressed
date.text: Will suppressing chat on MyAT&T Sales significantly affect order conversion?

date.tag: next, price block, device details, details page, smartphones

date.text: On the wireless details pages move the Next 12 w/ Down Payment option from a radio button to the Next drop down within the price block

date.tag: alice, price block, list pages, redesign
date.headline: Alice: Suppress 2-year in Mid-Atlantic
date.text: Suppressing 2yr in Las Vegas and Mid-Atlantic regions

date.headline: Search promo tile test
date.text: The image promo tile will get a higher number of clicks compared to the text based promo tile

date.headline: Suppress session expire in mobile
date.text: Removing session expire functionality will increase conversion.

date.tag: cln, price block, device details, details page
date.headline: Certified Pre-owned messaging
date.text: A marketing message above the priceblock will perform better than the standard treatment for CPO devices.

date.headline: Back office checkout page TFN
date.text: Allowing customers the opportunity to call the Back Office to help them complete an online order will reduce cart abandons, drive traffic to the Back Office and ultimately increase Gross Adds.

date.headline: Mobile Term Selection Tabs leading with 2-year
date.text: Framing content differently to separate payment types will not decrease conversion.

date.headline: Adobe Target - Present IRU discounts on att.com
date.text: Adding targeted IRU content to att.com pages will increase CTR to the IRU/Enrollment lander and increase successful enrollment/registration for discounts and conversion.

date.headline: Uverse Remove Landline Option From Check Availability Page
date.text: Removing the “AT&T Landline” option in the Check Availability Page will reduce user-entered errors and increase conversion rate by presenting the user with the appropriate Response Page (Green / Red).

date.headline: U-verse Mobile Check Availability Tooltip
date.text: Removing the Tooltips modal displayed in the Street Address field in the mobile Check Availability Page will not impact user-entered errors or CTR.

date.headline: Uverse Digital TV LOB Device vs Lifestyle Image
date.text: Device images drive more traffic than lifestyle images as they appeal to everyone

date.headline: Uverse com Global Nav Modification
date.text: Changing the links within the Global Nav on www.uverse.com will increase engagement and conversions.

date.headline: Add marquee on the mobile accessory list page
date.text: Adding a marquee on the mobile accessory only list page menu will increase accessory attach.

date.headline: Add eSupport Tools Center menu
date.text: Adding a 'Support Tools' menu to the Internet and email eSupport landing page will decrease the number of related calls.

date.headline: Adobe Target - Shop Device By Brand
date.text: Having a row of page content on the shop/wireless page that allows the customer to easily shop devices by brand/OEM will increase CTR rate to the OEM sorted list page and device details pages.

date.headline: Change My Orders Copy on global navigation
date.text: Customers are confused by myOrders being a true DF order versus an account management change (i.e. added a feature, changed a plan), changing the copy will increase understanding and click through, and reduce error count.

date.tag: price block, device details, details page, smartphones
date.headline: Adobe Target - CPO cross-sell marketing message
date.text: Adding a cross sell marketing message about Certified Pre-Owned (CPO) devices to new device details pages will increase traffic and conversion to CPO devices.

date.headline: Features List Add Multi Device Content
date.text: Adding content to differentiate insurance products will increase attach rate for device protection products.

date.headline: Uverse display total savings instead of a reward card offer
date.text: Displaying total savings instead of a reward card offer will increase click thru rate and orders for moving customers.

date.headline: Features list cross sell Android
date.text: Offering a case carousel on the services list page when a customer declines insurance will increase accessory attach.

date.headline: Overview page tiles
date.text: T-data slots on the myATT overview page will convert better than static tiles.

date.headline: UV Bundles $49 Offer Marquee
date.text: Displaying 24mbps versus 18mbps will increase click-thru-rate and orders.

date.tag: price block, cpo, details page, device details
date.headline: UPDATE CPO messaging
date.text: A marketing message above the price block will perform better than the standard treatment for CPO devices.

date.headline: Suppress marquee on accessory list
date.text: Hiding the marquee on the accessory list page will increase engagement and attach rate of accessories.

date.headline: U-verse Mobile Shop Page Default to Single Play
date.text: Displaying Single Play offers by default will result in improvement in DP and TV sales (hence revenue) out of total sales without impacting conversion rate.

date.headline: Add BYOD segmentation page
date.text: AAL new device orders will not decrease if we allow for BYOD segmentation at AAL entry points for new and existing customers.

date.headline: Comparison of interstitial treatment vs cart summary promo area
date.text: The cart summary promotional area will perform better to increase offer take rate when compared to the interstitial/modal.

date.tag: video, price block, device details, details page, smartphones
date.headline: Manufacturer video
date.text: Manufacturer videos on device details pages will yield higher conversion than 360 videos/images.

date.headline: Uverse show tablet users mobile experience
date.text: Tablet customers directed to the mobile experience convert better than tablet customers directed to the desktop experience.

date.tag: dtv, price block, device details, details page, smartphones, promo
date.headline: DTV and Uverse $500 Bill Credit Offer
date.text: We will serve Direct TV and Uverse customers (identified by user attribute user.attributes.bundledServiceIntent when they login via the new unified login) a special $500 worth in bill credits if they switch their wireless carrier to AT&T.

date.headline: Features List Page Alert Modal
date.text: Showing an alert modal when users click on 'I decline device protection' will increase insurance product attach rate.

date.headline: Review stars on marquee
date.text: Adding review stars on marquee for the S6 Active will increase CTR for the marquee

date.headline: BYOB Proceed to Checkout CTA and Page Behavior
date.text: Relocating the “Proceed to Checkout” CTA on the BYOB page will increase product attach rate and improve conversion rate.

date.headline: Default Tablet list to 2 year
date.text: Defaulting the tablet list page to 2 year rather than Next will increase conversion.

date.headline: Move Enjoy shipping method to top of list
date.text: Moving Enjoy to the top of the list for shipping method on cart summary for all customers in San Francisco and New York City Area will Increase take rate for Enjoy delivery service, without effecting order volume.

date.headline: Suppress smartphone list page left nav links
date.text: By removing the fingers from the smartphone list page, users will focus on the products that they came to the page to see, and we will see a lift in the click-through rate to the product details pages.

date.headline: CGC on list pages
date.text: Adding the star rating number and adding the word “reviews” in the current product star rating line will increase CTR.

date.headline: Referral urls for DTV
date.text: Directing customers to a different page from the Directv offers page will decrease customers directed to call to orders page.

date.headline: Gigapower landing page
date.text: Presenting an offer above the fold on the GigaPower Landing Page will increase CTR and conversion rate.

date.tag: uverse, price block, device details, details page, smartphones
date.headline: UPDATE to DTV and Uverse $500 Bill Credit Offer
date.text: We will serve Direct TV and Uverse customers (identified by user attribute “ATT.globalVars.cartContents.newCoFlow” when they login via the new unified login) a special $500 worth in bill credits if they switch their wireless carrier to AT&T; all other new customers will receive messaging for the $300 switcher bill credit

date.tag: tablet, promo, cart summary, modal, thankyou
date.headline: Upgrade tablet bundle modal
date.text: Offering upgrade customers an opportunity to purchase the iPad mini bundle will increase offer performance and gross adds.

date.headline: Military Marquee
date.text: By alerting military visitors to att.com about an IRU wireless discount they may qualify for, we will increase the total amount of military IRU activations.

date.headline: Mobile call for order help
date.text: Adding a phone number on mobile to provide users a way to call to order will increase conversion.

date.headline: Default Tablet list to 2 year on mobile
date.text: Defaulting the mobile tablet list page to 2 year rather than Next will increase conversion.

date.headline: Search on mobile
date.text: Moving the search box up on the m.att.com home page will increase the number of searches on m.att.com.

date.headline: Cart Summary Promo Area on MOBILE
date.text: Offering a tablet promo to New and AAL users on the mobile cart summary page will increase offer performance.

date.headline: Homepage device carousel
date.text: Adding a device carousel to the homepage will increase conversion.

date.headline: Trending now banner
date.text: By putting the top selling device text link above the global nav, we will increase gross adds because all users will see it regardless of entry point or clickstream.

date.headline: Dynamic Shop Wireless Marquee
date.text: By creating a marquee template that calls the current top selling device and contract option, we will drive more gross adds than the existing Shop Wireless marquee rotation during the same time period.

date.headline: Enjoy default selection
date.text: Moving Enjoy to the top of the list for shipping method on cart summary for all customers in San Francisco and New York City Area will Increase take rate for Enjoy delivery service, without effecting order volume.
